inn1.comm: short of a length, middle and leg, hits Rohit Sharma on the thigh pad
similar line as before as this time Guptill chops it away to the short cover fielder
this time angling down the pads as Guptill glances this one fine down the leg side for four
back of a length and covered well by Guptill
on the back foot to this back of a length offering from Bhuvneshwar
solid on the front foot this time to end the first over. Good start for NZ so far
surprises him with some extra bounce, right in that awkward region left-handers hate as Ryder fends this away behind square for a rushed single
plays this one off the back foot towards backward point
Shami tries another bouncer and this time Guptill is the unlucky party as this one hurries onto him from a shortish length, clanging him on the helmet as he went for a hook
straying on the pads as Ryder tucks this one down to deep fine leg
shortish length outside off which is run down to third man
a really messy delivery from Shami as he gets this bouncer horribly wrong, with the ball rising way over the batsman and keeper to carry behind for five wides
this time gets it right with a pitched up delivery that swings in from outside off as Ryder tries to blaze this away through the off side
on the front foot as this is played away towards the off side
Guptill plays inside the line of this fuller one that rushes past the outside edge to the keeper
slanting down the pads again as Guptill tries to get this one away, but the ball thuds into his thigh pad, so ends up being called a leg-bye
going across him with a back of a length delivery as Ryder mistimes an attempted back foot punch. Doesn't seem to be coming along too well to the batsman from Bhuvi
Ryder intentionally edges this one outside off and shaping across him to the short third man boundary as this one rushes across the surface
waits on this fuller one as Ryder just times this one sweetly square off the wicket on the off side, with the bounce threatening to go over point, but the fielder is able to stop it in the end
Ryder just swats away this length ball going across him through extra-cover for a boundary
too straight from Shami as Ryder whisks this off the pads to the fine leg boundary, with deep fine leg rather square in his position, which is risky with the short boundaries all around at Eden Park
fuller one going past the off stump as Ryder is cramped for space to get this away
again too straight from Shami as Ryder flicks this effortlessly to fine leg
tests him with a short one which surprises Guptill as he ducks under it
length outside off which is allowed through to the keeper
sublime timing from Ryder as he just opens the face to this back of a length ball going across him to find the point boundary. This one just screamed off the bat

and what a response from Bhuvi! The Indian contingent goes beserk as he gets this length ball to shape in on Ryder, who was looking to get this leg side, but the ball ends up hitting his pads onto the top of leg stump
welcomes him to the crease with a short one as Kane does the sensible thing by ducking away
full and on the money as this is defended back to the bowler
on the front foot to block this one to the off side
another short one from Kumar and Kane goes after it instinctively, but doesn't quite get it off the middle, as this spoons high over towards deep fine leg, but falls just short of the fielder
straying down the pads again as Kane swivels to pull this one fine, but deep fine leg has been placed in a finer position to tackle these kind of shorts
but this won't stop Guptill from trying his luck to another leg side bound delivery from Shami as he glances this one ever so fine to the boundary
another delivery slanting down the pads as Guptill fails to get this away, but still runs the leg-bye
length ball shaping away outside off as Guptill is equal to the task
a little bit of away swing for Shami as Kane shoulders arms
going down the leg side as this thuds into Kane's right pad, with Shami going for the appeal, but is turned down
this one angling in from outside off as Guptill looks to turn this away to the leg side
length outside off which is left alone by the batsman
beats the outside edge of guptill's bat as this one tails away at the last moment outside off
splays this one well down the leg side, with Mr. Bowden calling a wide
Guptill forward to this fuller one outside off, but decides to let it go to the keeper
swinging down the leg side as Guptill attempts to get this down to fine leg, with the umpire calling a leg-bye
tries to cut away this length delivery outside off, but fails to get bat on ball
138 kph, begins with an away swinger outside off which Guptill tries to cut away
chops this one, but luckily away from the stumps, as this one travels towards fine leg
wide outside off as Kane plays this one late to get it down to third man, but third man is able to rush over to stop this from hitting the rope
defended off the back foot by Guptill
fires in a bouncer which travels quite high over the batsman as the umpire signals a wide
on the front foot as this length ball is directed towards the covers for a brace. Also brings up the fifty for NZ
length outside off which is played late towards deep point
gets on the front foot as this is defended back to the bowler
shortish length outside off which is run down to third man
tries to cut this one through the covers but finds the close in fielder
fuller one outside off which is let through to the keeper
on the back foot as this is worked away to mid-off
defended once again by Guptill on the front foot to bring an end to the over
fuller one on middle which is worked away for a single
pitched up from Aaron as this is driven straight back to the bowler
in the blockhole as Guptill is able to dig this out behind square on the leg side
full again from Aaron as this is driven straight to mid-on
plays this shortish length with soft hands, but can't pinch the run as Aaron runs up to field this one

Guptill gets forward to direct this away to the leg side before darting off to the other end for a quick single. Jadeja, coming in from the leg side, picks it up quickly before having a shy at the non-striker's, but misses the stumps, with Guptill putting in a full dive to make his ground
presses forward to defend this first one from Jadeja
plants his foot as this is worked away to the off side for one
gets onto the back foot to punch this away through the off side, but finds short cover
this time looks for a quick single to the leg side, and is able to make it in time before the throw
played off the back foot down to long-on for a single
this time is able to pierce the gap through the covers with a well-crafted back foot punch
splays this one well down the leg side
whisked away to the leg side for a quick single
in the slot for Guptill as he leans into this drive through extra-cover for a boundary
plays this one with soft hands to the off side as Rahane, coming in from backward point, picks it up and throws it under-arm at the stumps, but misses. Kane would have been gone by a distance
short one from Aaron which has Kane ducking for cover
times this fuller one outside off to the man at point
short and wide outside off as Kane lets it through to the keeper
on the front foot and defended to the off side
this time turns it away to the leg side for one
punches this one off the back foot to the man at mid-on
prods forward to defend this one
steers this one behind square to backward point
cuts this one through to third man, with Ashwin trying his damndest to get to it, and in the end succeeds
defends this one off the back foot to Ashwin
presses forward to play this softly to the off side for a quick single
once again defended back to the bowler
played off the back foot down to mid-on
eases this one back to the bowler
safely negotiates this final one to end a good over from Ashwin
helped off the back foot to the fielder at mid-on
covers the line of this one heading down the pads
directs this one towards point for a quick single
advances down the track before lofting Jadeja towards long-off, but this one falls short
directed straight to short cover by Guptill
Guptill content to negotiate this final one to the off side
steered down to long-on for one
turned away to the leg side, but can't get it past backward square
needled down to long-on for another single
tries to squirt this one away by using his feet to get this past backward point, but instead succeeds in finding the fielder straightaway
defended again down to long-on for one
played back down to Ashwin to end the over
played down to mid-on for a quick single
dabbed down to long-on for one
tries to run this one to third man, but the fielder is in to stop this one from giving up a single
directed away to silly mid-on. Run rate has also moved under 5, which is quite an achievement considering the blazing start NZ had made
defended to the off side and is able to sneak in a single
once again attempts to dab this past third man
nurdled down to long-on for one
tries to tuck this round the corner, but backward square into play
driven down to long-on for a single
shuffles a bit towards middle as he sweeps this one fine past backward square to the boundary
played with soft hands towards point before setting off for one
played away to the leg side for one and to retain the strike
pushes this one behind square on the off side for two
on the front foot and fended away to the leg side
drilled down to long-on for one
driven straight to mid-on
tries to run this one past backward point
clipped to the leg side, looking for two, but can only get the one
driven down to long-on for a single as Raina recovers the ball
dances down to try a lofted shot, but decides to abort that for a more conservative stroke to the bowler
pushes this one past the bowler to long-on
finds the fielder at silly mid-on with a gentle push
once again finds the same fielder as they look to penetrate the inner field
tucks this one straight to the man at backward square
Kane able to get this away to the off side for one
lofts this one over extra-cover for a boundary
gets behind this one comfortably to run it down to long-on
defends this one to the off side
whipped off the pads to square leg for one
turns this one to the leg side for one
ambles down before lofting him beautifully through extra-cover for a six
once again looking to force the issue, but pushes this one straight to the bowler
able to get this to the leg side for a quick single
turns this away to the leg side for a single
Kane uses his feet to help push this one down to long-on
driven straight back to Jadeja, who does well to field this one
angles this one behind square on the off side for a single
driven straight to short cover
fires in one on middle and leg as Guptill fails to pick this up
tries to get this one round the corner, but backward square into play
goes for a miscued short-arm pull which affords him a single
pushed off the back foot to mid-on
driven straight to long-off for one
sacheys down the track before nurdling this to long-on
whisks this one away to the leg side
pushed past the bowler to his right to the long-on fielder
played straight to square leg to end the over
steered directly to long-off by Kane
uses the length to get deep in his crease before carting this through fine leg on one knee for a boundary. That shot also brings up his fifty
this time finds a single on the leg side
driven effectively by Kane to long-off
pushes this one cautiously outside off behind square
tries a forcing drive through the covers, but finds the fielder
tries to whack this one over the leg side, but miscues it
this time driven down to long-on for one
tucks this one round the corner to the fine leg boundary for four
gets low to play a short-arm pull to square leg
dabbed down to mid-on, but can't pinch the single
clobbers this one through square leg for a brace
fuller one on the pads which is clipped behind square on the leg side
drives this one quite loftily in the air towards extra-cover
plays an elegant lofted clip through square leg which races to the boundary
length on the pads which is helped down to long-on
plays this one with soft hands to the leg side
decides to go up and over to this shorter one from Aaron as he directs this towards extra-cover, with the ball beating an incoming sweeper cover to the boundary
and Williamson finds the gap on the leg side as he brings up another fifty, the third one of the series at that
looks to get this one away past silly mid-on, but the fielder is equal to the task
tries another forcing shot through the leg side
well fielded by Rahane as this one is directed towards silly mid-on, with Rahane pulling out the dive to stop this in its tracks
helped down to the fielder at long-on for one
whipped off the pads straight to mid-on
back of a length and angling in as Kane is able to cover the line
overpitched from Aaron as this is lofted over mid-on for a one-bounce four
backs away to try and direct this past backward point
eased off the back foot behind square to deep fine leg
swinging in on middle and leg as Guptill finds silly mid-on
clipped off the pads down to deep square leg for a couple
advances down to play this one to long-on
this time eases this leg side delivery towards fine leg, with backward square able to rein it in time
played on the front foot behind square
directed away to the off side by Kane for a single
punched off the back foot, but can't get it past silly mid-on
this time driven to short cover point to bring the 30th over to an end
short outside off as Kane steps back before clattering this over the covers for a boundary
dropped looks like Kane is in a mood to dominate as he hammers this off the back foot straight to silly mid-on, with Raina getting low to his right to try and take this before dropping it
length outside off as Guptill leans into a drive through cover
fuller one on middle and off which is lofted straight down the ground effortlessly, with his head bowed in trademark Guptill fashion
tries another short one which Guptill decides to drop his wrists to
and another lofted shot down the ground by Guptill as this one is hit powerfully enough to beat the long-on fielder to the rope
whipped away on the front foot to the leg side, but can't beat square leg
turns this fuller one away to the leg side for one
back of a length and pushed away to the leg side
driven down to long-on for one
flicked away to deep square leg for a single
tries another push off the back foot on the leg side for one
short of a length outside off which beats Guptill's play-and-a-miss outside off
rocks back before sending this short one from Shami to the deep midwicket boundary
short outside off as Guptill attempts a ramp over the slip region
short again as Guptill pulls this time behind square on the leg side, but fine leg is placed well by Dhoni

and in the quest for quick runs Williamson backs away, thinking he could cart another short one over the slips from Shami, but Shami is able to pitch this one well up on middle and leg, with Kane not in a position at all to work this away. Ends a terrific innings from Kane, who will be livid at not being able to kick-on after the start
angling in on Anderson from round the wicket as this is fended away to the leg side
reaches out before attempting to help this round the corner
and Anderson straight into the thick of things as he belts Ashwin with a flat six over long-on
gets deep in his crease this time before pulling this away to the man at deep square leg
driven down to long-off for a single

and Ashwin takes the big wicket of Anderson as he looks to cut away the bowler to the off side, but is cramped for space as this one hurries onto his stumps to have him bowled. Kohli is completely over the moon at this one as he pumps whatever he can to show off his pleasure
looks to turn away this first one from Ashwin to the leg side, but is sent back by the non-striker
short on middle and leg which is hooked by Guptill to the fine leg boundary for four
and Guptill once again on the back foot as this time he pulls this one in front of square to beat the converging fielders to the midwicket boundary
leans into a drive outside off as this is played straight to short cover
off the back foot as this is worked down to mid-on

Guptill almost succeeded in running himself out while on 98 as he plays this one straight to Kohli at silly mid-off, who has the time to aim at the stumps before firing this one wide of them, with Guptill stranded by miles
punched off the back foot to the leg side for none
tries a simple push to the leg side, but can't get the single despite the misfield from silly mid-on
directed right back to the same fielder as Guptill looks for that elusive single
this time defended back to the bowler
looks to whip this away leg side, but midwicket is all over this like white on rice
driven on the up, but straight to short cover
and on the final ball of the over, Guptill is able to find the run with a push to long-off to register a 5th ODI century
tries to force Shami through the off side with a drive, but the fielder is on top of this
tests him with a short one as Guptill, who has a hundred under his belt, is not about to miss this as he unleashed as emphatic pull through midwicket
full just outside off as Guptill is able to squeeze this out to the off side
pushes this one past the bowler for a single
low full toss on middle and leg which is powered over long-on for a boundary
tries to laser this one through the covers, but short cover is able to get behind this
able to play this with soft hands to the off side for a single
straying down the leg side as Dhoni collects from behind, with the umpire signalling a wide
and Guptill's fine innings comes to an end as he goes for the slog-sweep, but finds Rahane in the deep who takes a good catch at midwicket
able to get a four between the keeper and short third man
pushed to the leg side by Taylor, but can't pinch a run
full on middle and leg which is pushed down to long-on for one
short of a length and defended off the back foot to the off side
fires in a bouncer which is worked away to deep fine leg
in the blockhole as Brendon is able to keep this out
once again up there from Aaron as this is played away to the off side

short and wide as Brendon will not trouble the scorers today as he hammers this straight to Ashwin at point, who takes a safe catch. Aaron finally takes a wicket in his comeback match, and New Zealand are 230 for 5
and he is off the mark with a single down to long-on
Ronchi tries to get away Raina through the off side, but is late on the ball
this time tries through the leg side, but no dice
flicks this leg side delivery for a single, but ends up being called a leg-bye
Taylor fends this fuller one away to the leg side

tries a single on the leg side as Jadeja pounces on this quickly before rattling a throw to Dhoni, who breaks the stumps before he had collected the ball. But it is all okay as the batsman had made his ground in time
full and just outside off as Taylor gets an edge on it to get a streaky boundary through third man
helped down to the man at long-on for one
looks to cut away this shorter one through the off side, but ends up chopping it away instead
Aaron fires in a bouncer which Ronchi goes for as this one is top-edged well over the keeper, with third man watching it go over the rope
full again as this is drilled towards cover, with the pair running a hard single, before returning back because of the fielder not backing up the first throw
wide heading down the leg side as the umpire gives the signal
another overpitched ball, almost a yorker, as Ronchi is able to pierce the gap through extra-cover to get a boundary
runs this one down to long-on for one
eased off the pads towards backward square for one
pushed down to the man at long-on for a single
tries to caress this through the covers, but finds the fielder
into position quickly to bludgeon this Raina offering to the straight boundary
cuts this one away outside off, and with no fielders in the vicinity, it turns out to be an easy four
fuller one that is driven down to long-on

low full toss and Ronchi is simply in the form of his life as he flicks this one effortlessly to deep fine leg. There is a man in the Orange Brigade who tries a one-handed catch, but the ball bobbles out. Looking quite disconsolate now, that guy
pushed down the ground for a single

and finally India has managed to knock down the stumps as that man Rahane picks this one up from silly mid-off, who takes a bit of time before firing in the accurate throw. Taylor is the unlucky man as he storms off on 17
Ronchi knows he has to push on, and how. He proceeds to slam this full toss over the straight boundary for a six
and Ronchi keeps the strike with a pull to the leg side for one
driven down to long-on for a single
this time adopts the reverse sweep as he looks to get this past short third man
helped down to the man at long-on for one
ends up defending this one tentatively back to the bowler
pushed off the back foot as there is a mix-up between the two batsman, with the throw coming in to Jadeja who removes the bails before Nathan is able to get in at the non-striker's
and NZ are imploding here in Auckland as Ronchi, who is on 38 off 19, is the next go out as he flicks Jadeja towards deep midwicket, with Rahane taking the catch
dabs this one towards backward point, but can't steal the single
runs this one to the off side for a single to get off the mark
negotiates this one away to the leg side
length outside off which is defended back to the bowler
off the back foot and worked away to silly mid-on
clipped off the pads behind square on the leg side
tests him with bounceer as Southee swiels to avoid getting hurt
Southee negotiates this latest offering to the off side
goes for the big swing and a mass as the keeper collects from behind
another short one which has Southee inside-edging onto his pads while attempting a pull
once again short as Southee is late on this one
splaying down the leg side as the batsman backs away, and is definitely outside the line, but this ends up being called a wide anyways
fuller this time as McClenaghan goes for the lofted flick through the area
tucked round the corner to fine leg by McClenaghan
tries to get this one away through the leg side
another short one which has the batsman ducing wa
looking to push forward as Bhuvi fires in a bouncer, which the batsman misses
slower ball which he is able to get some bat ion as they picked up a single
shuffles over before attempting a paddle over fine leg
lobs this one behind point on the off side, but Jadeja is in the vicinity to take a forward diving catch, and hold on the chance
defends this one back to the bower, who then fires in a throw at the non-strikers
defended away by Bennett
chops this one away behind square for a single

this time goes for the back of a length ball down the pads as this is parried over, with Bhuvi at deep fine leg, who is in position to take the catch, but the ball ends up bouncing off his hands over the rope. Signalled six by the umpire
short of a length and allowed through to the keeper as Bennett offers no shot
slower ball on middle as Bennett once again ducks under it
speared in on the pads as Bennett squeaks this one away leg side for one
slower ball outside off which is heaved away over long-on for a boundary. It also brings up the 300 for NZ
charges down the track to this back of a length delivery, but ends up getting a deflection off the toe-end behind to the keeper, who is able to stop it
and Southee just clobbers this back of a length ball to deep midwicket, with this one sailing handsomely over the ropes. Yet another botched attempt by the Orange Brigade
steers this one by opening the face down to third man to get Southee on strike
tries a slower one just outside off as Southee has shuffled over too much, as this one goes past him on the right to the keeper
and Southee charges Shami to club him over long-off for a flat six. The cameraman was in position there, and looks like he saw a ghost after that last one
this time tries for the swivel hook but is late on this short one on middle
too full outside off as Southee once again backs away, but gets too far away as he misses a golden opportunity for runs

full on middle as this is miscued down to long-on. The NZ pair want two as they hustle hard, but the throw from the deep is able to reach Dhoni in time for him to have an under-arm flick to run out Tim Southee

inn2.comm: short of a length, middle and leg, hits Rohit Sharma on the thigh pad
on a length, into the pads, defended to square leg

dropped. A tough chance. Rohit takes a chance, slashes at a full wide one, Ryder flies at second slip, but manages only a hand to the overhead catch. He almost times this jump to perfection, but the ball hits the right hand as opposed to the middle of the both
on middle and leg, that's the line to bowl to Dhawan. He defends
worked to leg for a single
wide of the crease, angles this in, doesn't get any swing, and is worked away to long leg for one
gets swing first ball, Rohit defends off the front foot
beautiful drive. Leans into a length ball, gets under it, and drives it over mid-off for a flat six. Rohit has come out with a different mindset here
good comeback from Mitch. This one angles away just outside off, and beats the outside edge as Rohit pokes at it
on a length, middle and leg, defended to leg
short of a length, wide, left alone. Rohit expects to see outstretched arms at the other end, but he doesn't get the wide call
loose drive, in the air, not controlled, but it goes into the gap between cover and mid-off
bouncer, at his body, Dhawan ducks under it
some swing from back of a length, hits Dhawan's thigh pad
nicely push-driven on the up, but straight to extra cover
short of a length, middle and off, defended from the crease
short, chest-high, Dhawan manages to pull this well, over square leg. Not the best of timings, but still safe enough and far enough
length ball on the pads, whipped away through midwicket
fuller one outside off which is defended to the man at point
drives this next one solidly to short cover, who throws down the non-striker's stumps, just to make sure there is no funny business going on
once again Roht into position to keep this one out
Rohit rocks back to pull this short one from McClenaghan to deep fine leg, with the fielder able to stop it before the boundary
clipped off the pads to the leg side for a quick single
strides out to defend this latest offering
Dhawan watchful as he plays this one back to the bowler
Dhawan punishes Southee for straying on the pads with a lovely pick-up shot through the leg side for a boundary
this time plays through the off side with a scrumptious cover drive, but is blocked off by the efforts of mid-off

and Rohit gets away with one as he looks for the lofted pull through midwicket to this short one from Southee, but because he had planted his front foot, he was never really in balance for that shot, with the result being a top-edge which lands in no-mans land near where silly mid-off would have been
Dhawan makes sure to keep this next one out from Southee
ends the over with a beauty that rushes past the outside edge on a length
gets behind the line of this back of a length delivery
dances down the track before lofting McClenaghan high over long-off for a six. Excellent execution of the stroke, especially in regards to the economy of movement
eases this one off the pads to the leg side, but can't pinch the single
Rohit is simply putting on a clinic here with some neat striking of the ball. McClenaghan delivers a short one which has Rohit quickly into position to hammer this over square leg with a fine pull
tries the slower bouncer, slanting to the off side, as Rohit maneuvers this to the leg side with an improvised pull shot
on the front foot as he looks to get this away on the leg side
played off the back foot to the off side
short one outside off which has Rohit dropping his wrists to
looks to cut this one away through point, but Kane is all over this
runs this one down by opening the face to third man
this time it is Dhawan's turn to break loose as he shimmies down the track before heaving Southee down the straight boundary for six
opens the face to run this down to short third man for one
short of a length outside off which is parried to the off side
defends this length ball to the off side
looks to turn this one to the leg side
too full from Bennett as Rohit slams him effortlessly to the long-on boundary for his fourth six
and follows it up with a crisp back foot drive, but is unlucky to find point
angling down the pads as Rohit simply helps this along to the fine leg boundary
on the front foot as this is defended to the off side
back of a length which is cut away to silly point
brings this one close to Dhawan as he looks to cut this away
and this time he is able to pierce the gap by unfurling a drive through extra-cover
and again four more as he shuffles down to take this low full toss outside off and drive it handsomely through the same region for another boundary
able to ease this shortish length ball down to third man for a single
defends this first one from Anderson quite comfortably

advances down the track as Dhawan decides to go after him, but gets the direction all wrong as he pulls this straight into deep midwicket's throat, with Guptill full stretch as he dove forward to take this catch. You just can't keep him out of the action for long. I suspect Dhoni will not be too pleased with the manner of the dismissal, especially when he had spoke at length after the second ODI about the importance of the top-order to stick around deep into the innings
Rohit looks to guide this one past short third man, but hits it straight to him instead
defends this one on the front foot
defends this one off the back foot to the off side
able to run this down through the gap at third man for a couple
back of a length and defended by Kohli to the off side
allows this shorter one to rush past him to the keeper
Kohli exercises good judgment as he lets this one, honing in around off, to go through to the keeper
defended solidly on the front foot by Kohli
spears one in on and around off as this is pummeled back to the bowler, with the crowd uttering a collective gasp
well bowled by Bennett as he finishes off the over as a maiden
defended on the front foot by Rohit
on the back foot as this is cut away behind square to third man
presses forward as this is played towards mid-off
tries to guide this one past short third man, but finds the fielder
driven beautifully by Kohli on the front foot through midwicket to get himself going in Auckland
full on the pads as Kohli clips this to midwicket to end the over
Kohli has a waft at this back of a length delivery outside off, but is fortunate to not catch an edge
bowls this one wider outside off, but Kohli can not be coaxed into having a go
length ball coming back into Kohli as he is well aware of where his off stump is
played away to the fielder at point
short of a length outside off which is again played towards point
and he completes yet another maiden over to get his comeback off to a good start as Kohli chooses to leave this one outside off alone

you just can't keep that man away from proceedings as Anderson strikes again, getting Rohit to go for a lofted shot through extra-cover, but instead miscues it down to third man, with Bennett taking a safe catch. Ends yet another promising innings from Rohit, who had done all the hard work, but has given it away
gets solidly behind this back of a length ball from Anderson
on the front foot as this is played down to mid-off
short ball on middle and off which Rahane chooses to duck under
defended on the front foot by Rahane to the off side
back of a length pushed across Rahane, which is left alone by the batsman
run down to third man for a single
pushed off the back foot to the leg side for a single
and Kohli almost spells his own downfall as this is dead-batted by Kohli off the front foot, with the ball just bouncing over the stumps. Could have been really unlucky if it had rolled on somehow
and again gets an inside edge to this one he was looking to open the face to

and Bennett gets the Big One as he has Kohli, who was looking quite scratchy in his short stint, edge a good length ball from just outside off to the keeper, who takes the catch comfortably. Kohli knows it right away as he trudges back to the keeper, while Bennett kicks off some rather gregarious celebrations from the New Zealanders
gets a short one from Bennett which hurries on him as this is played away to the leg side
length ball shaping away into Raina as he blocks it out
on the front foot to work this one away to mid-off
Raina tries out his pull to this shorter one, but it didn't seem to quite come on to the bat
and tests him with another short one which has Raina ducking for cover
this time is able to maneuver this length ball outside off to the leg side for a single
length on the pads which is tickled down to fine leg
back of a length outside off which is played towards the off side
goes for an ambitious cut outside off as Bennett beats him for pace
eases this one off the back foot behind square on the leg side
on the back foot to this short one from Bennett
once again defended by Raina
pushes this one off the back foot to the leg side, but can't pinch a single
defended authoritatively by Rahane
punches this one off the back foot, but can't beat short cover
gets this one down the leg side as the umpire signals a wide
defended by Rahane
and this time it is Rahane's time to depart as he tickles this leg side delivery from Anderson straight to the waiting paws of Ronchi behind, who doesn't make a mess of it
fires this one wide outside off, but a bit too wide as the umpire signals wide
straying on the pads as Anderson is punished with a little glance to the fine leg boundary
negotiated by Raina successfully
Raina quickly into position to this short one as this is pulled to square leg
short of a length and allowed through to the keeper
this time on the pads as this is tucked behind to fine leg
sheer timing from Raina as he leans into this square drive square for four
tries out a shorter one on Raina as the umpire calls a wide for height
and delivers a more accurate bouncer to Raina which has him avoiding this at all costs. Takes some moxy to follow up a wided bouncer with yet another bouncer
length outside off which is left well alone by Dhoni
it doesn't take Dhoni long to tee off as he advances down the track a bit before whacking this over long-on for a huge six
and sensibly follows that up with a checked drive back towards the bowler
tries to play a flick to this slanting delivery, but ends up missing the ball
once again content to let this one through to the keeper
another let through to the keeper to end the over
length outside off which Raina tries to blast over the covers

short again from Mitchell as Raina places this down to deep midwicket with a pull that is played into the ground. Anderson does well to track it close to the boundary, and is able to put in a dive just inches before the rope to release it back, with replays confirming that
this time played away to the leg side for a quick single
strides out to meet this one as this is directed towards point
plays this one with soft hands behind square on the leg side
on the back foot as he whisks this away to the leg side for one
begins with one that is turned away to the leg side
Dhoni on the back foot as he whips this away to midwicket
gets forward to defend this one towards point
too wide from Williamson as he is able to pick the gap at third man to run this down to the boundary
this time uses his feet to punch this down the ground to long-off
played away off the back foot by the India captain as the fielder on the leg side makes a mess of it, allowing for a second to be taken
defended by Raina back towards the bowler
full from McClenaghan as Dhoni clips this through long-on for a couple
driven on the front foot towards short cover
bowls this a touch straight as Dhoni looks to short-arm pull
driven by Dhoni, but is unlucky to find the fielder on the off side
on the back foot as this is played away behind square on the leg side
and Dhoni charges him once more as he looks to clear midwicket, but instead hits this more towards square leg
tucked away to the leg side for a single
this time swept round the corner for one
uses his feet but can't get this drive past short cover
Raina helps this away on the leg side for one
Dhoni is dragging this match on as he pummels yet another six, this time over square leg, as he tries in vain to keep abreast with the required rate
goes for the bait as he attacks this short ball, going for the hook, and Southee, coming in from a squarish position, is unlucky not to get a hand on it. Good fortune there for Raina
steps down the track as he looks to club this over the covers
short again and Raina is able to maneuver this through midwicket with a controlled pull
driven down firmly to short cover point by Raina
Raina tries in vain to angle this one away through point, but can't get it past the fielder
spears in a yorker on middle and leg as Raina is able to dig it out towards midwicket
strays down the leg side as Raina gets a bat on it before setting off for a quick single
follows this short, leg side bound delivery as he helps it along to fine leg
glanced down to fine leg with ease by Raina
short from Southee and pulled away comfortably by Dhoni through the gap in fine leg
defended off the back foot to bring the 26th over to an end
punched off the back foot straight to short cover point
uses his feet to defend this one back to the bowler
gives this some air as Raina cuts this away to deep point, with a misfield from Guptill affording the second run
defended by Raina on the front foot
played away to the off side
shimmies down the track as he lofts this one towards the gap at deep extra-cover. Doesn't quite get enough on it, however, for it to reach the boundary
turns this one away to the leg side for a quick single

down the leg side as Raina goes for a hook, with the ball continuing through to the keeper. Southee appeals but the umpire signals a wide. Replays show that there may have contact with the bottom of the glove, but hard to determine
angles this one outside off to the fielder at third man
length outside off, which is a tad wide, as Bowden is on Southee's case
goes for the attempted yorker as Dhoni clips this one through midwicket
and there goes Raina in trademark style as he goes for the pull but gets a feather of an edge on it which carries to Ronchi behind
low full toss which is clipped to midwicket
good bouncer from Southee as this one surprises Dhoni because of the height
and is able to finish off the over with a dot ball
defended by Ashwin on the back foot
Ashwin able to nurdle a single to get Dhoni on strike
Dhoni slaps this one away through long-off for a single
Ashwin paddles this away to deep fine leg for one
driven back past the bowler on his left
flatter one from Nathan which is turned away to the leg side
looks to slap this one away outside off, but can't get it past point
able to clip this one on the front foot through the leg side for a single
tries to run this one down to third man, but the length was not quite right to do so

tests him with a short one as Ashwin gets on the back foot to hook this, with Anderson running full tilt to his right before going for the desperate dive, but the ball beats him to the boundary. Excellent effort that from Corey
this time is able to turn it away to the leg side for one
back of a length which is jabbed away by Dhoni to the off side
looks to belt this one away through the off side, but the timing is off
drills this one back to the bowler as they look for the gaps
drives this one to the off side as he sets off, with Ashwin hesitating on the run before continuing to his end
looks to cut this away off the back foot through point
pushed to the right of Nathan down to long-on
plays this one to the leg side for a quick single, which the pair are able to make
slanting in on middle as Dhoni clips this to the leg side
plays that trademark flick off the back foot behind to fine leg
turned away by Ashwin down to mid-on for a quick single
driven solidly by Dhoni towards mid-off
driven forcibly by Dhoni towards the off side, but he still can't get that single he requires
full on the pads as he flicks this one down to deep square leg to retain the strike
Nathan continues to keep it tight as this is played back to him
this time looks to turn it away round the corner, and is afforded the second when the first fielder approaching it fails to pick it up
looks to ease this one through the leg side, but silly mid-on is all over it

full on Dhoni's feet as he flicks this one to square leg, looking for the second, but Ashwin ends up slipping at the other end, and Dhoni, who is halfway down the track, has to run back at full tilt to make his ground before the incoming throw
eased down to long-on for a single
defended by Dhoni to the leg side to bring the over to an end
back of a length and rushing past Ashwin to the keeper
defended straight to the man at mid-on
length on the pads which is timed beautifully down to deep midwicket for a boundary
tries for the pick up shot through the square leg to this shorter one from Bennett, but this one doesn't quite go the distance as it spoons towards square leg
tries to slap this away on the off side, but doesn't get the ball very far
full and angling in as Dhoni pushes this to mid-off
driven past the bowler to long-on for one
eases this one away to the leg side for one
steered away behind square for one
plays this one towards point for one
Dhoni ends up playing this low full toss straight back to the bowler
punched off the back foot towards mid-off to end the over
begins with a length ball which is helped to the leg side for a single
ends up slapping this back of a length ball straight back to Anderson, who fields it on his follow-through
right in the slot and Dhoni lifts this easily over long-off to bring up a 53rd ODI fifty, and an invaluable one for India in terms of the context

and Southee takes a blinder of a catch at deep square leg as Dhoni is enticed into a pull shot which he has smashed towards that direction, with Southee getting to it before kneeling down and sticking his right hand out to pluck this. Sensational catch to get rid of the Indian captain, and suddenly India's hopes feel dashed
Jadeja just pushes this casually towards the leg side for one
Ashwin on the back foot as he plays a pick-up shot down to deep square leg
defends this one to the off side
plays a lovely back foot punch behind point, with the timing just right, as this races to the third man boundary
angles this one down to mid-on for a quick single
able to get under this and club it towards deep midwicket for one
looking for the attempted yorker as Ashwin fails to do more with this low full toss, with this one hit towards the leg side in the end
flicked away to square leg for one to bring the over to an end
on the back foot to this shorter one as he pulls it emphatically towards deep fine leg, who fumbles it on the first attempt
slower ball tailing towards the leg pad as Jadeja misses the line, with the ball striking that pad, but this was always going down the leg side
gets the line horribly wrong as this is dished down the leg side
tries to tease him with another short one down the leg side, but is called a wide once more, with Anderson unimpressed as he grumbles back to his mark
drags this slower ball down the leg side as Ashwin helps it along to the fine leg boundary, getting it past backward square for good measure
this time chooses to run it down to third man for one
room outside off, off the back foot, as he glides this to the third man boundary
this time edged past slip for four as McClenaghan is not at all happy with the end result
and McClenaghan needs to get his radar sorted as he gets this one horribly wide
unfurls a lovely cover drive through the off side as Ashwin gets the dive in to help make it three runs as this one doesn't quite reach the extra-cover boundary
good short ball from McClenaghan as Jadeja ends up withdrawing the shot. He could certainly have chosen to ramp this over the slips
short from McClenaghan as Jadeja pounces on this quickly to dispatch it with a pull through long-on and deep midwicket for a boundary
this time wide outside off as Jadeja misses on an opportunity to find the boundary as he ends up hitting this straight to backward point
slower ball outside off as he looks to slap this away, and after getting bat on it, sets off for a run, but is quickly turned back by Ashwin
low full toss which is directed down to long-on
another low full toss which Jadeja eases to the leg side for one
employs the bouncer as Ashwin is able to get under it and help it over the keeper to the fine leg boundary
another full one as he looks to hone in on his yorkers, with this one clipped uppishly through square leg
successfully dug out by Jadeja as Southee finally finds the perfect yorker
Southee misses his mark just slightly as Jadeja is afforded the room he needs to lift this over long-off for a six. India not giving up just yet
driven through the off side for one
gets this one to turn away from Jadeja as he pressed forward to defend
gets some turn again outside off as Jadeja cuts this away past point
Ashwin down the track before adjusting to flick this behind square
eased off the back foot by Jadeja to short third man
and gets the reverse sweep out as Ashwin picks this from outside off and gets it over backward point to find the boundary. Also brings up the fifty for Ashwin
shortish length ball which rises on Jadeja as he looks to ramp this over the slips. Ends up being called one for the over

right in the blockhole from Southee as Jadeja is able to push this down towards mid-off for one, but a wayward throw back ends up giving them a second as well, much to the delight of the Indian contingent in Auckland
pulled away through square leg by Jadeja to get a single
well wide outside off as Billy signals to the crowd
delivers this one outside off as Ashwin sees this early to delay his shot as he just opens the face to run this past the keeper to the boundary
this time goes straighter as Ashwin clips this low full toss to deep midwicket
slower ball on the pads as Jadeja helps this down towards mid-on for a single
cut away on the back foot down to sweeper cover
looks to paddle this one fine, but ends up hitting a bit more squarer than he wanted
dropped Jadeja given the kind of ball to go after, and he does, and is lucky not to hole out to Southee at long-on as he converges on it before letting this one drop
missed stumping what are you doing NZ? now Ronchi misses a dolly of a stumping as Ashwin advances down the track but plays the wrong line
punched off the back to midwicket for a single
pitches this one outside leg as this strikes, with Nathan going for an appeal, but the umpire is not at all interested
begins with a short one which has Jadeja trying in vain to ramp it over the slips
short and slanting away as Jadeja is able to get under this and ramp it wide of third man to the rope. Third man puts in a hopeful dive, but that is exactly what it was... hopeful

full and on the pads as Jadeja had no idea where that had gone, but he still goes for the run when he sees Ashwin hustling to the other end, who puts in a dive as he sees the close in fielder make an under-arm attempt at the striker's end.
ends up fending away this latest one from Bennett to the leg side, and is able to sneak in quick single as the ball comes to a dead stop away from any close in fielders

follows Ashwin as he sees him backing away to the leg side, with Ashwin trying to help this over the keeper, but Bowden then surprises most by calling it a wide, it looks like it may have called though because of the height, which is definitely a fair call upon viewing the replay
another short one which Ashwin tries in vain to ramp, but is not able to
low full toss outside off which is worked away down to midwicket for one
Ashwin where did that come from? He just steps down the track to heave Nathan well over the corporate boxes for a fantastic six! This one just seemed to climb and climb
now sensibly taps this one away to the off side for one
eased off the back foot towards backward square for a single
prods forward to defend this one from Nathan

Guptill. Not sure how to begin here. But. Simply. Amazing. Ashwin belts yet another one over midwicket, and for all accounts this looks as good as gone, but then all of a sudden Guptill displays some brilliance just before the rope as he catches this, with the momentum taking him over the rope, then pops it over to the field of play, before plucking the catch on the good side of the rope to claim it. Ends a fantastic rearguard effort from Ashwin, who has taken the scruff of this match and brought India back into it
press forward and played with the soft hands for a single
helped along to the leg side by Jadeja for a single. This brings Bhuvi on strike
sends a fierce cover drive straight to point, who is able to get behind it
short and just outside off as Kumar is able to bend his back before finessing this past the slip fielder to the third man boundary. Inventive shot that from Bhuvi
back of a length and Kumar has no choice but to go after it, but doesn't quite get enough meat on it as this spoons harmlessly over to the long-on area, with mid-on doubling back to claim this one
backs away to get in line with this leg side bound delivery before working it away down to long-on for a single
full and straight as Shami just hits this to the leg side
gets a low full toss screaming down the pads as Jadeja works this away for a single
Shami fails to tonk this fuller one as it continues on to the keeper
shortish length angling in on the batsman as Shami plays this with soft hands before setting off for the tight single, with Jadeja all but out if the direct hit had been made

right up in the blockhole as Jadeja is able to find enough leverage to clear long-on with the cleanest of strikes. Just what India required at this point as he knew it straightaway upon the ball leaving his bat

and Jadeja almost gets himself out next ball as McClenaghan favours the slower bouncer this time, with Jadeja having to work this fine towards the keeper as he was cramped for space, but lucky in that the ball died before it reached Ronchi

McClenaghan pleads his case while Ronchi looks increasingly bemused. They are still fighting. Fires in a short one which Jadeja seems to have hit as it went through to the keeper, but the umpire has decided not to give it out. Replays, however, show that it was indeed white as both HotSpot and Snicko are showing some positive readings in favour of the bowling side
back of a length and wide as Shami fails to put this away
goes for the big heave but ends up missing this length ball outside off
slower bouncer outside off which is played with soft hands as Kane is on it again, throwing an under-arm throw which again misses. That is his second chance in as many overs
slaps this short of a length ball away towards long-off

another slower bouncer from Anderson has helped him to a maiden five-wicket haul as Shami, looking for quick runs, ends up hitting this straight up in the air, with point getting under it to take a straightforward catch. NZ on top now as Varun Aaron joins the party
tries out another shorter one outside off as Jadeja tries in vain to ramp this over the slips
Aaron does the first job of getting himself to the other end with a glance to the leg side with soft hands
Jadeja you beauty! Is able to get under this fuller one from McClenaghan as he clears his front leg before tonking him over midwicket for a huge six
dropped Jadeja given a shorter one to go after, and he does, hitting this well over to third man, and Bennett, who is stationed there, comes in to try and take it, but ends up bobbling it as he dives
Aaron able to find a single with a dab to the leg side, with Jadeja running like Bolt to the other end
slow bouncer from McClenaghan which has been called wide by the umpire, much to the frustration of the big unit, who has some choice words
another short one as Jadeja goes after it, not totally in control, but still able to land this pull safely in the square leg region
back of a length outside off as Aaron has a flash at it, but doesn't quite get bat on ball
back of a length and just clubbed away by Jadeja to the deep midwicket boundary. Just what India needed. Anderson now under pressure for the remainder of the over
Jadeja thought about shuffling to the leg side, but decides to hold his ground as he sees this short ball slanting down the leg side. Umpire calls a wide, and NZ have a hissy fit
backs away but cannot connect as he goes for a hard slap over the covers. Still need 13 off 4
backs away but realises the angle is closing in on him as he opens the face to run this to third man, but refuses the single. Looks like he has learned from El Capitano
an attempted yorker speared down the leg side as he gets well out of its way, with the umpire calling yet another wide
back of a length as Jadeja improvises a flick that he is able to maneuver to the vacant fine leg region for four

Jadeja has just transcended a level as he simply hammers this short of a length ball right over the midwicket boundary for a six. The Indian contingent in the crowd go berserk. Now they need just 2 off 1. Can we possibly get a tied game now?

and Jadeja succeeds in getting the tying run as he works this fuller one away towards mid-off, with silly mid-off cutting it off, but unable to stop the single. They don't bother to go back for the second as they know they are still in the series
